text:
Saya mengunjungi Ibis Manado pada hari Sabtu, 3 September 2017 kira2 pukul 8:15pm WITA. Maksud kedatangan saya hanya untuk menanyakan penukaran telkomsel poin. Saya mengecek di traveloka (photo as attached) dan rate di depan hotel (saya tidak sempat foto) tertulis Rp.517.xxx dan saya pun mencoba menanyakan rate yg akan saya dapatkan karena menggunakan telkomsel poin akan mendapatkan diskon 40% dari harga normal.

Anehnya saat saya bertanya, resepsionis mengatakan harga untuk telkomsel poin adalah Rp.518.000 dari harga Rp.800.000 (sama saja tidak ada gunanya berarti) saya mencoba menanyakan kejanggalannya tapi beliau menjawab dengan hal yg sama dengan nada yg sudah mulai kurang enak didengar tapi yasudahlah saya iyakan saja.

Saya coba menghubungi call center telkomsel untuk mengkonfirmasi dengan maksud ingin mendapatkan penjelasan lebih, takutnya saya salah pengertian. Tapi jawaban yg diberikan persis seperti yg saya baca (photo as attached), dan kalaupun ratenya Rp.800.000 saya seharusnya mendapatkan rate Rp.4xx.xxx setelah diskon 40%.

Dengan maksud baik, saya mencoba untuk menghubungi pihak Ibis dan dijawab oleh resepsionis yg sama. Saya coba menjelaskan informasi yg saya dapatkan dari telkomsel, tapi beliau menjawab dengan nada yang kurang enak, "ibu telpon di telkomsel mana?" Saya jawab "di call center pusat". Beliau menjawab, "kalo kita kerjasamanya dengan telkomsel manado". Sayapun menjawab dengan sopan "oh okay, nanti saya konfirmasi lagi dengan telkomsel manado, makasih" dan tiba2 saya dijawab dengan nada tinggi "silahkan bu!"

Mohon maaf, bukan masalah uangnya, saya juga mengerti everyone has bad days tapi bagaimana cara menghandle guest dengan sopan dan profesional dalam circumstances dan tekanan apapun. Saya tahu Ibis secara keseluruhan memiliki reputasi yang sangat baik, tapi mungkin karena ekspektasi saya seperti itu menjadikan kejadian ini sedikit mengecewakan saya. Terima kasih.
title: Not very friendly nor helpful receptionist

Sebagai hotel baru Semua perabotan masih tampak apik, meski ketika memasuki kamar   akan terasa agak kurang nyaman, karena dinding kamar bukanlah tembok melainkan semacam partisi yang bila tetangga kamar menutup pintu maka akan sangat keras suaranya terdengar di kamar saya.
Selain itu mungkin karena masih baru, ada kelalaian petugas yang tidak mengecek dengan benar kesiapan kamar yang mau saya pakai. ini terbukti dari saya temukan pakaian yang tergantung di lemari baju (mungkin milik tamu sebelumnya).

text: Saat menginap di Ibis Boulevard Manado,hotel ini masih terbilang baru.Resmi beroperasional baru 2bln wkt saya datang.Lokasi sangat strategis,depan persis Mall Manado Town Square,dan sebrang sudah laut.Menginap di hari pertama (total 6hari menginap) tdk bisa tidur krn berisik,suara kamar sebelah tembus krn sekat antar kamar tdk begitu kedap (gypsum partisi sebagian).Kebetulan dpt tetangga kamar yg bersuara keras bila ngobrol. Apes dah. Petugas beberapa orang kurang ramah,saat minta kunci kamar kita terkesan dicueki krn dia ngobrol dengan temannya. Semoga kedepan personilnya ditingkatkan lagi utk lbh ramah/welcome thd tamu. Bagian kebersihan kamar juga kurang cepat. Kamar saya baru dibersihkan jam 17.00 lebih,shg saat balik dari kerja tdk bs langsung istirahat. Linen juga tidak diganti selama 6hari menginap,pdhl kita ingin seprei/selimut diganti krn agak kotor. Breakfast hotel cukup variatif dan beberapa kali menyajikan menu khas manado yg nikmat. Lokasi sekitar hotel sangat menyenangkan. Gak kurang hiburan dah....tinggal jalan kaki aja.
title: Hotel Baru Sekitar Boulevard Manado

untuk kamar tidur yang tersedia terdapat 2 bed dan 1 bed, dimana saat kami menginap hanya tersedia pilihan untuk 2 bed karena hotel dalam kondisi penuh. Sangat mudah sekali untuk memperoleh taksi karena letaknya yang sangat strategis.

text:
what a surprise to find the same layout and furniture of Ibis in Manado like other Ibis I've stayed in other city in Europe. Comfortable bed, compact and clean room, good location. Only take few minutes to the port to Bunaken, pay Rp 20K for Taxi. Across the biggest shopping mall in Manado, where you can buy almost everything you need. One thing is lack (minor thing) is the breakfast, not so many choice. I can not find traditional manadonese food with good taste. Need to improve in this matter.
But the wonderful thing is the hotel's staf. They are polite and give more then I expected. Eventhough they can not solve my problem with the hotel voucher, but their willingness to help is much appreciated.
title: Good hotel and Wonderful Staf

text: This hotel was a great surprise in many ways. I chose it for its proximity to the port of Manado, great if you have an early morning boat trip. Its a very comfortable hotel, has a very cool scandinavian design, great breakfast and super helpful and kind staff. The standard room is small but it is just enough, very clean, the bed is great, the view is interesting. Its just across Manado's biggest mall where you can spend hours if the weather is bad, shopping, having a massage or eating. I was so upset I did not chose this hotel also on our way back, but opted for Novotel by the airport, bad choice. Oh, and the price is just unbeatable! Great loundry service by the way!
title: Amazing hotel

text:
"You cant just eat good food. You've got to talk about it too." -Kurt Vonnegut-

My first time visit to Ibis Manado is surprisingly a happy moment. 

I wasnt planning to have dinner here, but after I saw my good friend's order arrived ,Sop Buntut, and it tasted good, I want to explore the local food. 

From the menu, there are so many interesting names that arised my curiosity! I was assisted by the friendly Chief Leader (Mr. Raymond K.) and he assured me that a dish named "Ayam Isi Bulu" (minahasa spicy chicken bamboo style served with steam rice), is great! 

 Finally, when the dish arrived... I have to agree with Mr. Raymond. Its great. 😊

All in all, everything I ordered satisfied my curiosity and simply make me happy ! 

Many thanks to and the nice staffs and most especially Mr. Raymond, for being patient with me and my orders.

The espresso were great ! I especially asked a 21 second as my usual request when i drink my espresso. 

A quote from Virginia Wolf : 

"One cant think well, sleep well, love well, if one has not dined well." 

Good Food is a must. 

I will be more than excited to return to this place.
title: Wonderful Afternoon with a taste of North Sulawesi Food

text: Stayed here for a long stay. The room was quite spacey, clean and comfortable. The staff were helpful especially Veby and Hendrik, kudos to them. Not to mention the housekeeping staff, they were all very nice and polite. The breakfast was nice serving local dishes such as woku, rica etc but a bit boring if you stay too long. On the plus side this hotel was within easy walking distance of the Manado town square and the beach. Tips, make sure you book an even number room for sea views and breathtaking sunset.

text:
We are hotel developers and managers and sometimes our reviews are a little different to other travelers.

We stayed at Ibis during a business trip to Manado as we are developing a few projects in North Sulawesi and needed to check-out the market. We generally don't fancy Accor hotels but it appeared this was the best hotel centrally located. We at first booked only two nights and another three nights at another hotel, which was so bad that we came back to Ibis' haven right away and stayed the full 5 nights here. We ate almost every day at the hotel for either lunch or dinner and it was always good. The service was very warm and friendly and we seriously have nothing negative to say about it. 

It is after all just an Ibis and hence they are limited in what they can do, thus only 4 points. But it was the best of what they could deliver.
title: Ibis but good

text:

text:
This is a lovely new hotel in Manado. It is located just opposite a new shopping mall (Town Square) with plenty of eating options. There is also a hypermarket with household goods as well as food. Cheap option for buying food gifts as presents! Rooms are spacious, air-con is quiet and responsive to temperature settings (how many hotels have you stayed in where it doesn't matter where you turn the dial to but it doesn't seem to make a difference?), bed linen is clean, brisk white, beds and pillows are comfortably firm, bathroom is spotless. Truly, it feels like walking into a luxurious oasis. I booked through agoda and got a small discount but prices are reasonable and the rooms are really good quality and value. The corridors are also air-conditioned and, get this, heavily carpeted! This means that corridor noise is kept to a minimum. The curtains are also thick. Wifi is free and signal strength was good throughout.
Downsides? Well, the mall may be literally just across the road but it is a really busy road. The pedestrian crossing is just a little way down to your left on exiting the hotel. Windows can't be opened, but this also helps prevent external noise. The street noise was negligible. Both times we stayed here only one lift was working. Not really a big deal but it fills up at breakfast time and you may need to wait if you're on a lower floor.

Breakfast is good - self-service buffet. Fresh fruit, choice of teas, egg station, western and asian hot breakfast selections as well as cereal and toast.
title: Oasis in Manado

text:
This new hotel in Manado has an excellent location, directly across the street from the best mall in the city, Mantos, making it very convenient for access to food, shopping and cinemas.
The staff are very friendly and helpful and most speak some English.
Breakfast buffet is mostly Indonesian food, although there were some pastries. Coffee comes from a self-serve machine and was much too sweet - there seemed to be no option to choose no (or less) sugar. Tea was good quality - Twinings brand. Staff had some trouble keeping the buffet stocked with all items as the hotel was very busy but upon asking they always happily re-stocked the item I asked for. The breakfast buffet would be greatly improved by having an egg station for made-to-order eggs.
The rooms were clean and new but not great. Unfortunately there only seems to be one category of room and it is quite small. There was only 1 chair in the room making it inconvenient for ordering room service food as only one of us could sit on a chair. There is no table in the room, only a shelf where you can put the food down. The bed is a twin size, making it a tight fit for 2 adults who prefer to have a bit of space. There is no option for queen or king size bed.
The bathroom lacks ventilation and is small, resembling a space pod.
The blinds in the room weren't particularly good at blocking out light so you may need to use an eyeshade if you are sensitive to light and want to sleep late.
Sound proofing is poor in the rooms - at 6:30 AM we could clearly hear kids running up and down the hall and screaming, and at 3:00AM it was drunk people singing and shouting. Not good for a peaceful night's sleep. 
Our room had a window but no scenic view; maybe this can be requested?
Wifi - we weren't given a user name and password on check in, so when we got to the room and discovered we needed these, we called front desk, who told us what to use but this turned out to be wrong and it didn't work. We called again and they sent an IT person to the room who did provide us with the correct user name / password. The Wifi wasn't very fast but it was adequate.
TV in the room was good - there were several English channels showing films as well as Indonesian language channels.
Check in and check out were relatively quick and simple.
Thank you to the kind staff at this hotel for making our stay a pleasant one.
title: Good location and friendly staff, so-so rooms

text: This was a perfect hotel to stay for my first trip to Manado, especially because of the superb staff, every single one but especially the Food and Beverage service team of Nova, Hariy, Iffan and Stevan, who gave me 5 star service and the best I have had on this 3 month trip around SE Asia! It is worth staying at this hotel just for the great staff. It is very easy to find as it is on the main road by the waterfront, across the street from the large Manado Town Square Shopping Center which has all the stores and restaurants you could possibly need - so convenient. It took around 25 minutes to get here from the airport - I took a Grab and the cost was around 100,000 rph ($8.50 Canadian dollars). I picked this hotel because of its good ratings on google and the convenient location. It was even better than I imagines, great value for what I paid. The rooms are super clean with a nice TV and foreign channels, a little fridge, safe, coffee maker, etc and the bed is super comfortable. This is not an expensive hotel but the value is really great. The buffet breakfast which was included in my room rate was very satisfying with lots of variety, a cook to order omelette station and really delicious coffee. It is also a very airy and pleasant restaurant and you can sit outside if you like. In the evening you can grab a couple beers/cocktails and occasionally they have karaoke as well! I highly recommend this hotel for its value and staff! The staff service created a great impression of Manado for me, a very friendly city.
title: Great Manado Hotel!!

text:
In total, we stayed 5 days, 4 nights in Ibis Hotel in Manado.
Check-in process, we had to wait till 1pm to enter the room. It's okay for us since we could get lunch in ManToS (Manado Town Square - Mall), just across the street.
We had the room what we ordered such as far from elevator, non-smoking, single bed, and the best part : window view to the sea. 
It's pretty standard room which we had experience before staying in other Ibis hotel. Oh ya, one thing is disturbing, the location of shower gel inside the shower "capsule" is annoying for us. Several times, we hit it since the space in the shower "capsule" is pretty small. Other than that, it was fine in the first night. But gradually, there was bad odor / smell which getting stronger and stronger along the hallway of the hotel room in one floor. We had to stop breathing and walking fast to the door of our room or hotel's elevator. After 3 days, there was nothing changes, then we reported to the hotel's receptionist, she immediately reported the service dept. The hotel took care of it but still there was odor left behind. 
The other challenges was breakfast. This hotel was very busy with group tours especially from China. My suggestion, you have to take breakfast very early around 6 AM if not then you would face very challenging situation, such as full table, no food left behind, long queuing for having eggs, etc. I suggested to hotel that she should provide more traditional food of Manado instead of international food.
Despite of those challenges above, the location of this hotel is very good due to very near with the beach, malls, resto-s, entertainment area so no wonder the hotel is very busy all the time. The hotel people is very kind, helpful and polite. 
Thank you. :)
title: Functional Place

text:
We spent 1 night at Ibis Manado - coming from Bunaken island and next day going to the airport. The hotel was a nice change from the hot room with just a fan on Bunaken and we welcomed air-conditioned room with relief. The room itself is typical Ibis-style standard that is quite common in Europe, so no surprise for us. Smartly designed, meeting the travellers' needs - comfortable bed, small but functional bathroom, some place to put and hang your clothes. Air-conditioning was very good. The corridors had very nice fresh fragrance spayed around.

Check-in was quite smooth although bit too long in my opinion. English is spoken. Reception staff is attentive. Good price as we booked during a promotion on Accor website. 

Location: bit far from the harbour if you go to/return from Bunaken, but it's an easy and cheap taxi ride. Right across the street there's a big shopping mall with a decent food court.

Fully recommended, good standard.
title: Very good hotel

text:
My grandmother and her sister previously had stay at here two year before, with positive reception, citing reason situated at strategic location. When gonna booked room for vacation to Manado, obviously quickly decided to stay at here.

As like most budget hotel, don't expect too much about room size. Not very large but comfortable. Bathroom size quite small but has unique design.

Note that to reach every floor level (except ground level) required to use card for room, because the lift button programmed can't work when pushed. Probably aim to prevent random stranger come to room.

While soundproofing was great inside room, area near door in contrast had very poor soundproofing. Sometime songs played from outside room can be heard clearly at room. When there were foreign tourist (coincidentally stay near my room) talking loudly with their friends at outside, it can be heard clearly too. My parent more unlucky, sound of adhan, scream and car from in the front street trough the room.

Breakfast was so so (as I predicted before). While had wide range menu choice for budget hotel standard, majority of menu had tasteless or in case of local cuisine had strange flavor and below average quality than version that found on street food or restaurant.

In concluding, the hotel isn't as good as told by my grandmother. Perhaps much better next time booking room without breakfast.
title: Strategic Location But Faced Poor Soundproofing

text:
On early 2016 when I went to Manado, this hotel just opened but I already booked for other hotel, that's why when visited Manado last week I would like to stay in this hotel because of its location right in the city centre. It is across a shopping mall (Manado Town Square) and nearby many restaurants. 
We stayed in this hotel for 2 nights and we got a room on 8th floor with sea view. Simple room and clean, all staffs are nice and helpful.
We ordered Soto and Bubur Ayam for in-room service and I expect the food with standard portion for 1 person, but it came with deep bowl and it is similar for 2 portions :) and taste good.
The breakfast variant is standard, some menu (I had kwetiaw goreng, ikan asam pedas) were tasteless. 
The service, room, location are worth with the rate that I pay. 
If the hotel have a swimming pool it would be great for visitor with children.
title: Good hotel and location

text: Ein Tauchunfall im Februar 2020 war der Grund für einen längeren ungewollten Aufenthalt im IBIS in Manado.  Da tägliche Druckkammer Sitzungen notwendig waren über eine ganze Woche und einem anschließenden Flugverbot, quartierten wir uns über diese zwei Wochen im IBIS Manado ein. Von der ersten Minute ist uns die Freundlichkeit der Angestellten und des Hotel Managers Defrie Manoppa herzlichst entgegengebracht. Kein Wunsch blieb offen, ob Zimmerwahl, Meerblick, Stockwerk, Essen, Taxibestellung, Ausflug samt Organisation, Tipps, Ratschläge und darüber hinaus die hzerzliche Menschlichkeit aller Bediensteten samt Hotel Manager. Manado ist eine typische indonesiche Stadt, die nicht unbedingt ein typischer Urlaubort ist. Aber wir konnten so das Einheimische Leben der Indonesier etwas mehr kennenlernen. Der nächste Besuch in Manado und wenn es nur ein Stopover ist, wird wieder hier im IBIS sein. Vielen Dank Defrie Manoppa
title: Ungewollter länger Aufenthalt aber herzlich!

text:
Rest runt på mindre platser och stannade här några dagar för att ta det lugnt, gå på bio och planera den fortsatta resan.

Modernt och fräscht hotell. Rent och välskött. Bra wifi. Bra sängar. Bra badrum väl upplyst. Bra tv och utbud på tv-kanaler med många filmkanaler. Över lag bra service även om det finns luckor (viss arrogans i hur man bemöter kund) och det skedde några misstag som t ex feldebitering av mitt kreditkort - som senare visserligen korrigerades av en manager men där frontdesk inte verkade bry sig särskilt. 

Över lag ett mycket bra hotell nära det bästa köpcentret i Manado och på gångavstånd till färjan till Bunaken.

Det är egentligen bara en sak som störde mig och det är det faktum att detta hotell inte erbjuder ett bra kaffe till frukosten. Det som erbjuds är en nescafeautomat som levererar ett svart kaffe som mer är att känneteckna som te. Vill du ha en riktig kopp kaffe får du lägga till 30000 rph till ett frukostpris på ca 73000 rph. Det enklaste guesthouse i obygden levererar ett bättre svart kaffe till frukosten än detta franska hotell ;-)
title: Väldigt fräscht

text:
新しいホテルです。
立地もショッピングモールの目の前にあります。
部屋の広さは普通、ただし、シャワーのみでシャワールーム、洗面ルームは狭いです。
朝食はブッフェでジュース類がない他は満足できるレベルです。
なによりもスタッフの対応が良くなかった。
当日予約をしたにもかかわらず、確認せずに予約がないと言われ、確認の後、今度は希望の部屋がないと言われ、強制的に別の部屋にさせられました。
また某ホテル予約サイトで支払い済みにもかかわらず、こちらで支払うようにと二重取りさせられました。（後日返金、面倒だった）
値段も4000円強であれば他の6000円前後のホテルの方が価値があると感じました。
title: 新しい、立地良し
